my children are a disappointment.

content.text: Good! Just finished a long ride on my favorite horse.
How fun! I love riding horses. Where did you go for your ride?
I went to a local stable. I'm trying to get in shape.
That's awesome! I need to get more exercise too. I just moved to work for an organization that better aligns with my values.
That's great! I need to find a new job. I'm relocating my troops to a new location.
Oh, that sounds exciting! I'm sure your troops are excited too.
Yeah, they're a little stressed out, but they're handling it well.
I'm glad to hear that. What are you looking for in a new job?
I'm looking for a job that allows me to be more creative. I love listening to alternative rock music while I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill.
That sounds like a great job! I'm sure you'll find something perfect.
Thanks! I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.
Good luck with your exams! I'm going to be writing in my journal and reflecting on my past.
